name: Sala - Burning Blade
text:
1 Earth-Tuner and 1 Non-Tuner "Sala -" Monster
When this card is Synchro Summoned, You can pay half your LP; place up to two "Sala -" Pendulum Monsters From your Deck in the Pendulum Zones. You can destroy 1 card in your Pendulum Zone; Place 1 "Sala -" Pendulum Monster from your GY in that Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Sala - Burning Blade" once per turn.
